title: 13 Striking, Masculine Flowers That Men Will Love

steps.title: Red roses
steps.content: Red roses Roses are a classic symbol of love and romance, and some even consider them a blend of masculine and feminine energy. Red can be a bold, masculine color, as well, so red roses are a great option for men who prefer to lead a classic, traditional lifestyle. [1] X Research source

steps.title: White orchids
steps.content: White orchids In ancient Greece, orchids were seen as a fertility plant and were a sign of masculinity. Today, white orchids make great gifts for men because of their clean, crisp color and because they add a calming energy to a room. Orchids can help men relax after a stressful day at work. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Sweet Williams
steps.content: Sweet Williams As the name suggests, Sweet Williams have historically symbolized masculinity as well as gallantry. While the exact origins of the name are up for debate, some stories claim Sweet William was a noble, lovelorn hero in various romantic ballads. For this reason, these pink and red blooms can be a romantic gesture for your knight in shining armor. [3] X Trustworthy Source University of California Division of Agriculture and Natural Resources Extension program of the University of California system devoted to educating and improving local communities Go to source

steps.title: Red chrysanthemums
steps.content: Red chrysanthemums Red chrysanthemums have a striking, rich color and a strong appearance thanks to their bold petal shapes. Many men value mental, physical, and emotional strength, which can be represented by these flowers. Chrysanthemums are also a symbol of friendship, so they’re a great way to express gratitude for male friends in your life. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Birds of paradise
steps.content: Birds of paradise If the man in your life is bold, confident, and likes to show off, birds of paradise might be the best flower for him. These tropical flowers are known for their bright orange, crane-like blooms, which can add a bit of masculine edge to a room. They represent love, faithfulness, and thoughtfulness, so they’re a great romantic gesture. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Gerberas
steps.content: Gerberas With their large, colorful blooms, gerberas can brighten a room and are perfect for men who have a youthful spirit and a positive outlook on life. These flowers have a playful energy that are great for celebrating joyous occasions or for a pick-me-up if the man in your life is feeling down. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Black dahlias
steps.content: Black dahlias Black dahlias are dark and moody flowers, so they’re a great option for a man who likes a little mystery. With their deep burgundy hues, these blooms add a luxurious, masculine edge to any bouquet, and they pair well with herbs like rosemary and thyme.

steps.title: Peace lilies
steps.content: Peace lilies Peace lilies have a unique shape and their striking white petals look lovely in masculine spaces. They represent tranquility, peace, and are known for their air-purifying qualities, so they’re a great gift for any man who wants to create a calm, relaxing space. Plus, they’re easy to care for as they don’t require much light or watering, so they might be the ideal flower for someone with a busy lifestyle. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Scabiosa pods/pincushions
steps.content: Scabiosa pods/pincushions These eye-catching, rustic flowers can add texture to any masculine floral arrangement. They feature a spiky ball center and strong, wiry stems, so they have quite the unique appearance. These are great for men who may want something a bit different from traditional flowers. [8] X Research source

steps.title: White hydrangeas
steps.content: White hydrangeas White hydrangeas have a neutral color and androgynous shape that look great in any bouquet, whether your man prefers a traditional or modern flower arrangement. Hydrangeas are a great way to show thanks or appreciation, especially for a friend, mentor, or family member.

steps.title: Craspedia/Billy Buttons
steps.content: Craspedia/Billy Buttons These flowers feature distinct round, yellow blooms that resemble golf balls. They’re vibrant and striking, and their unique shape may interest men who want something a little different. Craspedias also represent good luck, health, prosperity, and unity, so they’re a wonderful choice for expressing heartfelt sentiments. [9] X Research source

steps.title: White anemones
steps.content: White anemones White anemones feature bright white petals with a deep indigo center, which exudes masculine appeal. Anemones also symbolize well wishes during big life changes, so they’re a great gift for a man who just graduated, got a promotion, or started a family. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Succulents
steps.content: Succulents If your man is a little prickly about receiving traditional flowers, succulents are another great gift option. Succulents come in a variety of colors, shapes, and sizes, and they’re generally low-maintenance plants, so you should be able to find something that works well for his lifestyle. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Birthdays
steps.content: Birthdays Because men don’t usually receive flowers, sending him a bouquet for his birthday is sure to surprise him. Whether you live far away or plan to see him later, a flower delivery is a great way to show him you’re thinking about him on his special day. [12] X Research source For these occasions, consider sending peace lilies, birds of paradise, or gerberas.

steps.title: Anniversaries
steps.content: Anniversaries Whether it’s a dating or wedding anniversary, show your man how much you love him with a bouquet of flowers. Roses are a great romantic option, though you can choose any flowers you like. Pair the bouquet with a bottle of wine and prepare for a romantic evening. [13] X Research source For these occasions, consider sending roses, lady’s mantle, or dahlias.

steps.title: Father’s Day
steps.content: Father’s Day You may have sent your mom flowers for Mother’s Day, but have you ever sent your dad flowers on Father’s Day? This is a great way to cheer your dad (or your husband) up and show him how much he means to you. Feel free to throw in a gift card to his favorite store, take him out to dinner, or plan a fun day trip to celebrate the holiday . [14] X Research source For this occasion, consider sending sunflowers, succulents, or lucky bamboo.

steps.title: Work promotions or graduations
steps.content: Work promotions or graduations If a man in your life is celebrating an achievement, like graduating from high school or college, getting promoted, or getting a new job, show your support for his accomplishments by sending him some flowers. A joyful bouquet is a great way to cheer him on and encourage his dreams. For these occasions, consider sending orchids, tulips, or irises.

steps.title: Go for bold colors.
steps.content: Go for bold colors. When picking out masculine flowers, look for blooms with deep, rich colors like maroon, purple, orange, and yellow, or go for flowers in more neutral tones, like white. In general, it’s best to avoid pastel colors, like pink. Every man is different though, so take his favorite colors into consideration, as well. [15] X Research source Examples: black dahlias, white anemones, red roses

steps.title: Choose striking shapes.
steps.content: Choose striking shapes. The best flowers for men often have unique, angular petals. When choosing a masculine flower arrangement , look for flowers with strong structural petal shapes. Go for flowers with robust and bold silhouettes. [16] X Research source Examples: birds of paradise, snapdragons, angelonia

steps.title: Find blooms with a more masculine scent.
steps.content: Find blooms with a more masculine scent. When choosing flowers for a man, think about the cologne he wears, and if possible, note which scents are included in the fragrance. Some flowers have strong, spicy scents that are used in or reminiscent of men’s cologne. [17] X Research source Examples: carnations, lavender, geranium

steps.title: Pick a unique vase.
steps.content: Pick a unique vase. Sometimes, the way you present flowers can make them appear more masculine. When choosing a vase, go for one made of wood or metal rather than the traditional glass or crystal look. This may align with his personal style and home decor a bit more. If your man likes beer, another option is to place the flowers in his favorite beer stein!

steps.title: Get a rose tattoo for a classic look.
steps.content: Get a rose tattoo for a classic look. Roses are one of the most popular flowers when it comes to tattoos, and there are a ton of styles to choose from. Roses look great in the American traditional style or in black and gray realism. For even more of a masculine edge, add other elements to the design, like a lion or skull. The possibilities are endless. [18] X Research source

steps.title: Choose cherry blossoms for a soft touch.
steps.content: Choose cherry blossoms for a soft touch. Cherry blossoms are beautiful flowers that symbolize life and death, as well as beauty and violence. Cherry blossom tattoos are also a great way to blend femininity and masculinity. For a large statement piece, get a cherry blossom tree tattooed as a sleeve or spreading across your chest. [19] X Research source

steps.title: Get a lotus for a unique tattoo design.
steps.content: Get a lotus for a unique tattoo design. Lotus flowers have become a popular tattoo for men. They symbolize peace, strength, and intelligence, and their pointed petals stand out when drawn with bold, thick lines, a style that is often popular with masculine tattoo designs. [20] X Research source

steps.title: Go for a sunflower if you want something cheerful.
steps.content: Go for a sunflower if you want something cheerful. Sunflowers may not be the first flower that comes to mind when you think of masculine flowers, but they’re connected to the sun, which has traditionally represented masculinity and fertility. [21] X Research source Sunflower tattoos are becoming more popular among men, and they can be a great reminder to focus on the positive. [22] X Research source

steps.title: Get the flower of life for an abstract design.
steps.content: Get the flower of life for an abstract design. The flower of life is an intricate pattern consisting of overlapping circles that form flower-like shapes. It’s a geometric symbol that represents life, the cycle of creation, and the interconnectedness of all things. If traditional flowers aren’t your thing, this design is a great way to incorporate nature into your tattoos. [23] X Research source

steps.title: Is it weird to send men flowers?
steps.content: Is it weird to send men flowers? No, it isn’t weird to send men flowers, but it may seem out of the ordinary. Flowers are typically associated with women and femininity, so it’s often rare for men to receive flowers as gifts. However, sending men flowers is just another way to show you care, and can help strengthen your relationship. [24] X Research source

steps.title: How do men feel about receiving flowers?
steps.content: How do men feel about receiving flowers? Every man is different, so each one will feel differently about receiving flowers. Some men will feel flattered, as the gesture shows that you care deeply and are bold enough to do something out of the ordinary. Others may feel embarrassed because they see flowers as a feminine gesture. If you’re not sure how the man in your life will react, it might be a good idea to ask him ahead of time. [25] X Research source Receiving flowers as a man is nothing to be embarrassed about, but the gesture may be difficult for some men to accept depending on how they were raised. If you think the man in your life may be upset, consider giving him another gift instead.

steps.title: What floral scents are masculine?
steps.content: What floral scents are masculine? While floral scents are often associated with women’s fragrances, they’re frequently used in men’s cologne, as well. Typically, scents like lavender, geranium, and neroli are considered masculine. Rose, jasmine, iris, and lilac are also popular floral notes in men’s fragrances. [26] X Research source

steps.title: What else can I send with the flowers?
steps.content: What else can I send with the flowers? Think about what he likes and try to incorporate his interests and hobbies. Flowers are enough on their own, or go all out by sending him a gift basket with his favorite snacks and beverages. For an extra special surprise, get him tickets to his favorite sporting event or concert. [27] X Research source
